explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a red articulated dump truck parked on a vacant lot, its arm raised in the air.

[0-7] An operator sits in the cab, manipulating the truck's arm. The arm, raised high, has a grapple on the end that is filled with dirt. The arm slowly descends as the grapple gradually opens, scooping the dirt. It then rotates, moving the dirt over to the truck bed and dumping it.
